import React, { useEffect, useLayoutEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { deatilsProduct } from "../actions/productActions"; function ProductScreen(props){ const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const dispatch = useDispatch; useEffect (() => { dispatch(deatilsProduct()); return() => { // }; }, []) return
Back To Results

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating}stars({product.numReviews}reviews)
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description
    {product.description}
  • Price: {product.price}
  • Status: {product.status}
  • Qty:
} export default ProductScreen;
